headline: Bank of America Calls Synopsys (SNPS) a Lower-Beta AI Play With Catch-Up Potential
summary: Synopsys, Inc. (NASDAQ:SNPS) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 11, Bank of America upgraded the stock to “Buy” from neutral and raised its price target to $560.00 from $500.00. The bank said that following latest results, shares of Synopsys are attractive at current levels. “We believe the relative derisking […]

headline: Marvell’s (MRVL) Stock Pops After Q3 Earnings – Time to Buy?
summary: Summary Marvell Technology (NASDAQ: MRVL) recently got just the pop that AI investors have been waiting for. Despite it still lagging behind peers like Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) and Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO), the company delivered guidance that exceeded Wall Street expectations, causing a notable post-earnings stock surge. During a recent episode of The AI Investor Podcast, ... Marvell’s (MRVL) Stock Pops After Q3 Earnings – Time to Buy?

headline: Nvidia or OpenAI: Who will take the crown?
summary: The battle to secure Yahoo Finance's annual Company of the Year award is down to two AI titans: Nvidia and OpenAI.
